item.title: 联邦通信委员会 80 亿美元电话补贴将接受最高法院审查
item.description: 美国最高法院将权衡对联邦行政权力的新一轮攻击，同意审议每年 80 亿美元的补贴是否符合宪法，这些补贴有助于支付穷人和农村居民的电信服务费用。【原文：The US Supreme Court will weigh a fresh line of attack on federal administrative power, agreeing to consider the constitutionality of the $8 billion annual slate of subsidies that help cover the cost of telecom services for poor people and rural residents.】

item.title: 实际上，今年的股票市场很无聊
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 债券市场在 11 月实现七年连涨
item.description: 由于美国总统大选和美联储会议的召开，发行商保持观望，而投资者的强劲需求则推动了价格上涨，市政债券市场将迎来连续第七个 11 月的上涨。【原文：The municipal bond market is headed for its seventh-straight November of gains, with the US presidential election and a Federal Reserve meeting keeping issuers on the sidelines, while strong investor demand has boosted prices.】

item.title: Coatue 校友吉尔罗伊和科技界资深人士拉贾拉姆将创办风险投资公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Coatue Management 的校友 Michael Gilroy 和长期从事技术工作的 Gokul Rajaram 正在组建一家风险投资公司。【原文：Coatue Management alumnus Michael Gilroy and longtime technology executive Gokul Rajaram are forming a venture firm, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷经济在紧缩政策推动下意外萎缩
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在积极推行紧缩政策的同时，努力重启濒临崩溃的经济。【原文：Argentina’s economy unexpectedly shrank in September, as President Javier Milei fights to restart an ailing economy amid an aggressive austerity push.】

item.title: 布里奇沃特听从海妖之歌，男爵却在抵制：ETF IQ
item.description: 欢迎收看 ETF IQ，这是一份专门报道 14 万亿美元全球 ETF 行业的周报。我是彭博新闻社记者兼主播凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to ETF IQ, a weekly newsletter dedicated to the $14 trillion global ETF industry. I'm Bloomberg News reporter and anchor Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: Polymarket在对预测投注的审查中封杀法国用户
item.description: 基于加密货币的预测市场 Polymarket 已阻止法国用户在该平台上进行新的投注，因为该国的赌博监管机构正在加强审查。【原文：Cryptocurrency-based predictions markets Polymarket has blocked users in France from placing new bets on the platform amid growing scrutiny from the nation’s gambling regulator.】

item.title: 欧洲公司 Permira 进军美国 CLO 市场，发行量激增
item.description: 欧洲收购公司 Permira 将在美国 1 万亿美元的担保贷款义务市场上首次推出交易，交易量接近创纪录的发行量。【原文：European buyout firm Permira is debuting its first deal in the $1 trillion US collateralized loan obligation market, as deals near an issuance record.】

item.title: Ally Financial 考虑出售信用卡业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Ally Financial Inc. 正在探索出售其信用卡部门，三年前，该公司曾通过收购重新涉足信用卡业务。【原文：Ally Financial Inc. is exploring a sale of its credit card arm, according to people familiar with the matter, after getting back into that business through an acquisition three years ago.】

item.description: 美联储周五公布了即将进行的框架审查的更多细节，其中包括对央行沟通工具的特别关注。【原文：The Federal Reserve announced more details about its upcoming framework review Friday, including a specific focus on the central bank’s communication tools.】

item.title: 新泽西州州长将 "竭尽全力 "阻止拥堵定价计划
item.description: 新泽西州州长菲尔-墨菲（Phil Murphy）致力于阻止纽约市目前的拥堵收费计划，即使联邦政府已经最终批准了该计划。【原文：New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy is committed to blocking the current New York City congestion pricing plan even as the federal government gave its final stamp of approval.】

item.title: 特鲁多重启支出游戏，调整利率和经济增长的赌注
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）表示，在通胀减弱和大选迫在眉睫的情况下，他将重拾自由支出的游戏规则。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau signaled a return to his free-spending playbook as inflation wanes and an election looms, accelerating a bond selloff due to expectations of faster growth and a deeper deficit.】

item.title: 英伟达股价大涨意味着首席执行官的基金会必须加倍捐赠
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）飙升的股价给黄仁勋的慈善基金会带来了挑战：随着股价的攀升，基金会需要捐赠的资金也随之增加。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s surging share price has created a challenge for Jensen Huang’s charitable foundation: As the stock climbs, so does the amount of money it has to give away.】

item.title: Apax 和 Warburg 筹备荷兰电信公司 Odido 的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Apax Partners 和 Warburg Pincus 正在探讨从德国电信公司（Deutsche Telekom AG）收购的荷兰电信公司 Odido 的首次公开募股事宜。【原文：Apax Partners and Warburg Pincus are exploring an initial public offering of Odido, the Dutch telecommunication business they acquired from Deutsche Telekom AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 在政府宣布支持另一位候选人之后，斯洛文尼亚议会否决了安东-罗普担任该国新任央行行长的提议。【原文：Slovenia’s parliament rejected Anton Rop as the country’s new central-bank chief after the government declared its support for another candidate.】

item.title: 拉皮丹称石油市场对伊朗制裁风险 "沾沾自喜
item.description: Rapidan Energy Group 总裁鲍勃-麦克纳利（Bob McNally）说，石油市场对伊朗和俄罗斯被加强制裁的前景所带来的地缘政治风险 "仍然沾沾自喜"。【原文：The oil market is “still complacent” about the geopolitical risks posed by the prospect of heightened sanctions against Iran and Russia, said Bob McNally, president of Rapidan Energy Group.】

item.title: 贡渥集团鹿特丹炼油厂加入欧洲停产名单
item.description: 贡渥集团正在暂时停止其鹿特丹炼油厂，因为它赚不到足够的钱，这是欧洲大陆的工厂正在努力与世界其他地区的后起之秀竞争的最新迹象。【原文：Gunvor Group is temporarily halting its Rotterdam oil refinery because it’s not making enough money, the latest sign that the continent’s plants are struggling to compete with upstarts in other parts of the world.】

item.title: 丰业银行敦促在亏税抛售季到来之前进行转换交易
item.description: 随着税损卖出季节的临近，丰业银行建议在今年进行转换交易，因为今年的收益基础广泛，有必要采取更有针对性的行动。【原文：As the tax-loss selling season approaches, Bank of Nova Scotia is recommending switch trades in a year where broad-based gains necessitate more targeted action.】

item.title: 阿波罗和 Citadel 揭开被动型基金主导地位的隐性代价
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和花旗集团（Citadel）作为主动投资领域的巨头，都指出了被动型基金日益突出的风险。【原文：Apollo Global Management and Citadel, giants in the world of active investing, are both pointing out risks that exist as passive funds gain in prominence.】

item.title: Suncor 的 "摇滚明星 "火袋油砂矿创下产量纪录
item.description: Suncor Energy Inc. 在阿尔伯塔省的油井原油产量在 10 月份创下历史新高，原因是该公司首席执行官称 Firebag 油砂生产基地为 "摇滚明星"。【原文：Suncor Energy Inc.’s crude output from wells in Alberta rose to a record in October on gains at the Firebag oil sands site, which the producer’s chief executive has called a “rock star” operation.】

item.title: 巴西乙醇生产商因巴西国家石油公司的合资计划而反弹
item.description: 在巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）宣布正在与 "大型 "生物燃料生产商谈判成立合资企业后，包括 Raizen SA 和 Cosan SA 在内的巴西乙醇生产商纷纷上涨。【原文：Brazilian ethanol producers including Raizen SA and Cosan SA rallied after Petrobras announced that it was in talks with “large” producers of the biofuel to create a joint venture.】

item.title: 锁定宽松模式的欧洲央行不会对欧元区通胀跳升感到不安
item.description: 欧元区通胀率回升至 2% 以上，不太可能令欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）打算放松对该地区衰退经济的限制的政策制定者们感到困扰。【原文：A surge in euro-area inflation back above 2% is unlikely to bother European Central Bank policymakers intent on loosening constriction for the region’s souring economy.】

item.title: 加密货币蓬勃发展，Cboe 将推出现金结算比特币 ETF 期权
item.description: Cboe Global Markets 公司表示，它将上市首批与比特币现货价格相关的现金结算指数期权，这标志着传统交易所最新增加了加密货币相关证券。【原文：Cboe Global Markets Inc. said it is set to list the first cash-settled index options related to the spot price of Bitcoin, marking the latest addition of cryptocurrency-related securities to traditional exchanges.】

item.title: 临时主席表示，Northvolt 必须解决生产质量问题
item.description: Northvolt AB 临时主席汤姆-约翰斯通（Tom Johnstone）说，Northvolt AB 需要集中精力改善经营状况，并进行财务重组。【原文：Northvolt AB needs to focus on improving its operations as well as restructuring its finances, Interim Chairman Tom Johnstone said.】

item.title: 英国称嘉能可为防止乍得泄漏事件做更多努力
item.description: 英国政府称，嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）没有进行适当的尽职调查，以防止和减轻其位于乍得的一处产油资产 2018 年发生的废水泄漏事件的影响。【原文：The UK government said Glencore Plc didn’t conduct appropriate due diligence to prevent and mitigate the effects of a 2018 wastewater spill at one of its oil-producing assets in Chad.】

item.title: 德意志银行牵头的集团寻求剥离蛋白棒收购贷款
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，以德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）为首的银行集团正在寻求出售一笔 7 亿美元的定期贷款，用于支付收购蛋白棒品牌 FitCrunch 的费用，因为本月早些时候他们曾因持有这笔债务而陷入困境。【原文：A group of banks led by Deutsche Bank AG is looking to offload a $700 million term loan to pay for the acquisition of protein bar brand FitCrunch after they were stuck holding the debt earlier this month, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】
